data.name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel IV - Lossless Audio Pack
data.detailed_description:
Enjoy the sounds of Trails of Cold Steel IV with this lossless audio pack! This audio pack includes the following audio file types:
- Background music
- Sound effects
- Japanese and English voices
data.about_the_game:
Enjoy the sounds of Trails of Cold Steel IV with this lossless audio pack! This audio pack includes the following audio file types:
- Background music
- Sound effects
- Japanese and English voices
data.short_description: Enjoy the sounds of Trails of Cold Steel IV with this lossless audio pack! Contains background music, sound effects, and both Japanese and English voices.

fullgame.name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel IV
